webservice module¶

A web app for heart rate data storage.

Users can create user profiles, add heart rate readings, retrieve information from the database and obtain either the global or a specified interval average.

webservice.average_email(user_email)¶

Returns average of all heart rate measurements for user with specified email

Parameters:user_email – user email to identify patient file requested
Returns:average of all heart rate measurements
webservice.calculate_average(hr)¶

Returns the average heart rate calculated from an input list

Parameters:hr – list of heart rates
Returns:average heart rate
webservice.check_input(r)¶

Validates input heart rate data and returns information about input

Parameters:r – request from getjson()
Returns:boolean of whether the input is valid or not
webservice.diagnosis(hr)¶

Returns a diagnosis based on the input heart rate - normal, tachycardic or bradycardic

Parameters:hr – heart rate
Returns:String with the condition
webservice.heart_rate()¶

Stores heart rate measurement for the user with the specified email

Returns:user information that was stored by the POST request if successful

and an error message if input is invalid

webservice.heart_rate_email(user_email)¶

Returns all heart rate measurements for user with specified email

Parameters:user_email – user email to identify patient file requested
Returns:all heart rate measurements
webservice.interval_average()¶

Calculates and returns average heart rate for the user since time specified

Returns:the average heart rate since the last time specified
webservice.set_up_logging()¶

Sets up data logging

Returns:none
